caption.p: Antioxidant capacity of medicinal plant PRE, infusions and decoctions using DPPH assay after normalization to GAE. Dose-dependent antioxidant capacity of PRE ( A), infusions ( B) and decoctions ( C) at different concentrations. ( D) Antioxidant capacity of infusions versus decoctions at 25 µM GAE final concentration. The radical-scavenging activity was evaluated through the DPPH colorimetric method at 517 nm. Data are means ± SEM of three independent experiments.
